products.name: Crispy Comté Frico Cheeseburgers
products.description: Salty, buttery, and slightly sharp, Comté cheese crisps similarly to Parmesan, adding an irresistibly crunchy frico layer to these cheeseburgers.

products.name: Ultimate Veggie Burgers
products.description: These veggie burgers from our San Burgo hit every satisfying, savory note with a hearty mix of pearl barley, chickpeas, mushrooms, and crispy panko.

products.name: Nacho Burgers
products.description: These next-level burgers are topped with gooey cheese, salsa, and tortilla chips. Pair them with a bold, berry-rich Zinfandel.
